biotools.summary: Comprehensive on-line resource with curated datasets of mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) rearrangements. MitoBreak provides a complete, quality checked and regularly updated list of breakpoints from three classes of somatic mtDNA rearrangements: circular deleted (deletions), circular partially-duplicated (duplications) and linear mtDNAs.

bioschemas.name: MITOBREAK
bioschemas.summary: Comprehensive on-line resource with curated datasets of mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) rearrangements. MitoBreak provides a complete, quality checked and regularly updated list of breakpoints from three classes of somatic mtDNA rearrangements: circular deleted (deletions), circular partially-duplicated (duplications) and linear mtDNAs.
